code:
# @name: gantt-project-timeline
# @type: gantt
# @format: mermaid
# @description: Project timeline with phases, tasks, and milestones

gantt
    title Project Development Timeline
    dateFormat YYYY-MM-DD
    
    section Planning
    Requirements Gathering    :a1, 2024-01-01, 2w
    Architecture Design       :a2, after a1, 1w
    Sprint Planning          :milestone, after a2, 0d
    
    section Development
    Backend API              :b1, after a2, 3w
    Frontend UI              :b2, after a2, 3w
    Database Schema          :b3, after a2, 2w
    Integration              :b4, after b1 b2 b3, 1w
    Alpha Release           :milestone, after b4, 0d
    
    section Testing
    Unit Testing            :t1, after b4, 1w
    Integration Testing     :t2, after t1, 1w
    User Acceptance Testing :t3, after t2, 1w
    Beta Release           :milestone, after t3, 0d
    
    section Deployment
    Production Setup        :d1, after t3, 3d
    Data Migration         :d2, after d1, 2d
    Launch                 :milestone, after d2, 0d
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
